plot: What are we looking for when we travel? What kind of pictures do we take and what kind of images do we get? Three people in three different times travel through the same regions.
title: Von der Notwendigkeit die Meere zu befahren
plot_es: What are we looking for when we travel? What kind of pictures do we take and what kind of images do we get? Three people in three different times travel through the same regions.
original_name: Von der Notwendigkeit die Meere zu befahren
